visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use Arial font with size 12 for labels and titles, and color them black. Data series: The series should be named 'Temperature' and contain the data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4]. Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to red for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to white, add a legend at the bottom, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart uses Arial font with a size of 12px and black color for all labels and titles. The x-axis categories represent the months from January to December, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series is named 'Temperature' and contains the given temperature data. The series color is set to a gradient from blue to red. The chart background is white, and the legend is positioned at the bottom center of the chart. The chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to ensure adequate spacing around the chart.
